about store: Welcome to MyShop.pk — Pakistan’s trusted online fashion store for premium shirts, pants, and shoes. We aim to bring stylish, comfortable, and affordable clothing to your doorstep across Pakistan.
product categories: We specialize in men’s and women’s shirts, pants, jeans, and shoes. Every item is designed for comfort, durability, and trend-inspired fashion.
shirts collection: Our shirts include casual, formal, and party wear — available in multiple colors, fabrics, and fits for every occasion.
damaged product: If you receive a damaged product, you can request a return or replacement within 7 days of delivery. Please keep the original packaging and proof of purchase.
pants collection: We offer jeans, chinos, and formal trousers made from high-quality cotton and denim for daily and office wear.
shoes collection: Our footwear range includes sneakers, loafers, and formal shoes — perfect for work, casual outings, or events.
materials and quality: We use premium materials like cotton, denim, and leather to ensure comfort and long-lasting wear.
size and fitting: Sizes range from Small (S) to Extra Large (XL). Each product has a detailed size chart to help you find your perfect fit.
washing instructions: Most clothing items are machine washable with mild detergent. Always check the care label for best results.
new arrivals: Our store updates every week with new shirts, pants, and shoes based on the latest Pakistani and international fashion trends.
best sellers: Our best-selling products include cotton casual shirts, stretch-fit jeans, and leather loafers loved by customers nationwide.
shipping policy: We deliver all over Pakistan, including Karachi, Lahore, Islamabad, Rawalpindi, and Faisalabad. Orders usually arrive in 2–4 working days.
delivery charges: Delivery is free on orders above Rs. 2500. For smaller orders, a standard delivery charge of Rs. 200 applies across Pakistan.
express delivery: For urgent orders, we offer Express Delivery within 1–2 working days in major cities for Rs. 300.
order tracking: After placing your order, you’ll receive a tracking number by SMS or email. Use it to check your shipment status online.
delayed order: If your order is delayed beyond 5 working days, please contact our support team to check the courier status.
payment methods: We accept Cash on Delivery (COD), JazzCash, Easypaisa, Bank Transfer, and Credit/Debit Cards via secure gateway.
cod charges: A small Rs. 50 handling fee may apply on Cash on Delivery orders.
return policy: Items can be returned within 7 days of delivery if unused and in original packaging. Returns are not accepted for clearance or hygiene products.
exchange policy: If you received a damaged, wrong size, or incorrect item, contact support within 48 hours for an exchange or refund.
refund policy: Refunds are processed within 3–5 business days after the returned item passes quality inspection.
return pickup: For approved returns, our courier partner will collect the parcel from your address within 2–3 working days.
order cancellation: Orders can be canceled within 2 hours of placement by contacting support. After shipping, cancellations are not possible.
how to order: Browse our website, add products to your cart, and click 'Checkout'. Enter your shipping details and payment method to confirm the order.
account creation: Creating an account helps you save your address, view order history, and track orders easily.
gift wrapping: We offer free gift wrapping on request during checkout with an optional custom message.
bulk or wholesale order: For bulk or corporate orders of shirts, pants, or shoes, email us at sales@myshop.pk for special rates.
discount offers: We regularly offer seasonal and festive sales, giving up to 50% off on select items. Subscribe to our newsletter for updates.
newsletter subscription: Subscribe to get notifications for flash sales, new arrivals, and exclusive discount codes.
store timings: Our online store is open 24/7. Customer support is available Monday to Saturday, 10 AM – 8 PM.
contact support: For help, email support@myshop.pk or WhatsApp +92 300 1234567.
customer support: Our team assists with product queries, tracking updates, returns, and payment issues promptly.
security and privacy: We use SSL encryption and secure payment systems to protect your personal and financial data.
product warranty: Footwear and leather items come with a 6-month warranty for manufacturing defects.
how to track order: Go to 'Track Order' on our website, enter your order ID and phone number to see real-time delivery updates.
out of stock products: If an item is unavailable, click 'Notify Me' to get an SMS/email when restocked.
international shipping: Currently, we deliver only within Pakistan. International delivery will be available soon.
how to contact: You can contact us anytime through our website chat, email, or WhatsApp for order-related support.
shirt sizes: We offer shirt sizes from Small (S) to Extra Large (XL). Some styles also come in XXL.
pant sizes: Our pant sizes range from 28 to 44 inches in waist size, covering all fits.
size availability: You can check available sizes on each product page before ordering.
size chart: A detailed size chart is available on every product page to help you choose the right fit.
fit types: We offer slim fit, regular fit, and relaxed fit options for both shirts and pants.
shirt length: Our shirt lengths are designed for standard Pakistani height and body fit.
pant length: Pants are available in standard and tall lengths, usually ranging from 38 to 44 inches.
measurement guide: Use our measurement guide to take accurate chest, waist, and length measurements.
fabric types: We use premium cotton, denim, polyester blends, and stretch fabrics for comfort and durability.
cotton fabric: Cotton is soft, breathable, and perfect for hot Pakistani weather.
denim fabric: Our denim is stretchable and long-lasting, suitable for daily wear.
linen fabric: Linen shirts are light, breathable, and ideal for summer wear.
polyester fabric: Polyester blends add flexibility and wrinkle resistance to the fabric.
stretch jeans: Stretch jeans offer comfort and easy movement with a soft fabric feel.
formal pants: Formal pants are available in slim and regular fits, perfect for office wear.
casual pants: Casual pants include chinos and jeans, available in multiple colors.
jeans colors: Jeans are available in blue, black, gray, and washed shades.
shirt colors: We offer shirts in plain, printed, and checkered styles across many colors.
color variation: Actual colors may slightly vary due to lighting and screen display.
stock availability: If a product is out of stock, it will be marked as 'Sold Out' on the product page.
out of stock: Out of stock items can be restocked soon — use the 'Notify Me' button for updates.
restock update: We restock popular clothing items every week based on demand.
sale section: Visit the 'Sale' section for discounts up to 50% on shirts and jeans.
discount percentage: Discounts vary by product but can go up to 70% during seasonal sales.
clearance sale: Clearance items are offered at heavy discounts but are not eligible for return.
price range: Our shirt prices start from PKR 1,499, and pants start from PKR 2,499.
premium collection: Our premium collection includes high-end cotton and denim clothing with superior stitching.
casual wear: Casual wear includes T-shirts, chinos, and jeans for everyday comfort.
formal wear: Formal wear includes dress shirts and trousers suitable for office or events.
party wear: Our party wear shirts feature bold designs, shiny fabrics, and stylish fits.
embroidered shirts: Some shirts include minimal embroidery for an elegant look.
plain shirts: Plain shirts are simple, classic, and available in every color.
printed shirts: Printed shirts include floral, geometric, and abstract designs.
checked shirts: Checked shirts are made from soft cotton and available in modern patterns.
half sleeves: Half-sleeve shirts are perfect for summer comfort.
full sleeves: Full-sleeve shirts are available in both casual and formal collections.
collar types: We offer classic, button-down, and spread collars across different shirt designs.
button quality: All shirts feature durable, high-quality buttons that don’t break easily.
stitching quality: Every item is double-stitched for strength and long life.
fit guide: Slim fit hugs the body, regular fit offers balanced comfort, and relaxed fit gives extra space.
waist size: Pant waist sizes range from 28 to 44 inches, true to Pakistani standards.
inseam length: Our standard inseam lengths are between 38 to 44 inches.
stretch pants: Stretch pants provide extra comfort and movement flexibility.
fabric durability: Our fabrics are tested for long-term durability and resistance to shrinkage.
washing care: We recommend cold machine wash and gentle drying for all cotton items.
ironing instructions: Use medium heat for cotton and low heat for polyester blends.
shrinkage: Most fabrics are pre-shrunk to prevent size reduction after washing.
breathable fabric: Our fabrics are breathable, keeping you cool even in warm weather.
color fading: Colors remain bright even after multiple washes due to quality dyes.
made in pakistan: All our clothing is proudly made in Pakistan using local craftsmanship.
imported fabric: Some items use imported fabric for added softness and color quality.
eco friendly: We use eco-friendly dyes and sustainable production practices.
available sizes: Sizes include S, M, L, XL, and XXL for most products.
plus size: We also offer plus sizes in selected collections.
youth sizes: Youth and teenage sizes are available in our casual collection.
kids wear: We have a small kidswear section for ages 4–12 years.
women collection: Our women’s collection includes trendy shirts, tops, and trousers.
men collection: Men’s collection features jeans, chinos, and formal shirts.
unisex products: Some T-shirts and hoodies are unisex and suitable for all.
hoodies: Our hoodies are made from fleece cotton for comfort in winter.
winter wear: Winter wear includes sweatshirts, jackets, and hoodies.
summer wear: Summer wear features light cotton and breathable shirts.
sportswear: Our sportswear includes joggers, track pants, and dry-fit shirts.
joggers: Joggers are made with soft stretch fabric, ideal for workouts or casual use.
cargo pants: Cargo pants include multiple pockets and a loose fit for casual style.
t shirts: T-shirts are available in round neck, V-neck, and polo styles.
polo shirts: Polo shirts are made from premium pique cotton fabric.
round neck: Round-neck shirts are simple and great for casual outfits.
v neck: V-neck T-shirts add a modern touch to your daily look.
printed t shirts: Printed T-shirts feature stylish graphics and trendy quotes.
plain t shirts: Plain T-shirts are available in all colors for everyday use.
black shirt: Yes, we have plain black shirts available in all sizes.
white shirt: Our white shirts are available in cotton, linen, and formal options.
blue jeans: Blue jeans are our bestsellers, available in light and dark washes.
black jeans: We offer black jeans in both stretchable and rigid denim fabric.
ripped jeans: Ripped jeans are available in modern fits for casual wear.
chinos: Chinos are available in khaki, beige, and navy colors.
formal trousers: Formal trousers are made with wrinkle-free fabric for office use.
belt loops: All pants include standard belt loops and button closure.
pockets: Our pants feature 4–5 functional pockets for convenience.
zipper quality: We use durable YKK zippers that don’t break easily.
product origin: All items are designed and stitched in Pakistan.
in stock: Yes, the item is currently in stock and ready to ship.
out of stock alert: This item is currently out of stock but will be restocked soon.
limited edition: Limited edition designs are available for a short time only.
order availability: Most products are available for immediate order unless marked otherwise.
ready to ship: Ready-to-ship items are dispatched within 24 hours of order confirmation.
pre order: Some premium items are available on pre-order basis and take 7–10 days to deliver.
